historyAndLegacy.title: Model Evolution
historyAndLegacy.description: The M2 debuted in 2016 as the spiritual successor to the 1M Coupe, offering compact high-performance dynamics.

historyAndLegacy.title: Special Editions
historyAndLegacy.description: M2 Competition (2018) with S55 engine from M3/M4, and M2 CS (2020) with increased performance.

historyAndLegacy.title: Racing Pedigree
historyAndLegacy.description: The M2 has been used in various motorsport events, including the BMW M2 CS Racing model.

historyAndLegacy.title: Market Reception
historyAndLegacy.description: Praised for its balanced chassis, engaging driving experience, and affordability compared to larger M models.
